A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Out of all the star wars movies The Last Jedi was a film set in the star wars universe but lacked the story that usually goes with it. A movie filled with dissapointment and inconsistencies from the star wars universe that lacked any development in the story. The whole film felt like it could have been improved as it deprived viewers of what they wanted in a disguise of a 'twist' that lacked creativity.
